mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, c.category_name AS category, b.board_name AS boardName FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.status = 'NORMAL' ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post p WHERE p.board_id = b.board_id) DESC LIMIT 7

SELECT b.board_id, b.category_id, c.category_name, b.board_name, b.board_level, b.sort_order, b.recommend_yn, b.status, b.status_changed_at, b.created_by, b.created_at, b.updated_by, b.updated_at FROM board b LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY b.sort_order
